value: Throughout this course, we will make a sprite move left, right, up, and down when the arrow keys are pressed by playing a sound.

Why do you think that the computer is not following our instructions?
It is because telling a computer is not like saying something to humans. Here, we have to write a set of instructions and run it on the computer to follow those steps.
The instructions that a computer can understand to complete a given task is called a Program. A program is also called a code or a script.
So, now we will learn to write programs!
